xwikidoc.title: Office Importer Suggest
xwikidoc.content: #if("" == "$!{request.xpage}") #warning("This page contains the office importer auto-suggest script") #end #set($ok = $response.setContentType("text/xml")) #set($typeParam = "$!{request.type}") #set($numberParam = "$!{request.number}") #set($inputParam = "$!{request.input}") <results> #if("spaces" == $typeParam) #set($number = $util.parseInt($numberParam)) #if($number == 0)#set($number = 10)#end #set($matchingSpaces = $xwiki.searchSpacesNames("where lower(doc.space) like '%$inputParam.toLowerCase()%'", $number, 0, [])) #foreach($space in $matchingSpaces) <rs id="$velocityCount" info="">$space</rs> #end #end </results>
